understanding.C: You want to close this item as non-SSOT (ephemeral) evidence/experiment in vpm-mini/main (Phase 2). The learnings have already been applied to the SSOT (code/state), so we will annotate and close the tracking issue, optionally label it, and archive/remove the ephemeral artifacts with a trace back to the applied change.

acceptance: Acknowledged. The item will be closed as non-SSOT (ephemeral) with a trace to the applied SSOT changes. Provide ISSUE_NUMBER and PATH_TO_EXPERIMENT_OR_EVIDENCE_DIR (and optional PR/commit SHA) to finalize.
